news.title: All New Intel 12th Gen Laptops
news.discription: Demonstrating MSI’s determination and vision for the coming era of the metaverse, the new laptops are equipped with up to Intel® CoreTM i9 processors.

news.title: iPhone 13 🍎
news.discription: The iPhone 13 Pro and 13 Pro Max also have a new top storage option, 1TB, but the base option remains at 128GB, so those who needed more than that still have to spend extra. If you’re cool with the 128GB, then the prices start at the same spot as last year.

news.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090
news.discription: The Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 is high-end desktop graphics card based on the Ampere generation. It uses the big GA102 chip and offers 10,496 shaders and 24 GB GDDR6X graphics memory.

news.title: God of War Ragnarok
news.discription: God of War 5: Ragnarok has now been confirmed, and it will arrive far sooner than any of us ever expected. Sony is attempting to steal all of my money, and they are certainly succeeding.
